original: intros n x H1 H2. unfold CoPrime. apply gcd_intro. - apply (prodBig1 n x). intros z Hz. apply H2. apply Hz. - intros d Hd. apply dec.decDeMorgan. intros H. apply Hd. clear d Hd. apply lt_wf_rec with n. intros m IHm Hm. apply H1. + apply lt_n_Sm_le. apply Hm. + apply lelt_trans with m. * apply gt_S_le. apply gt_n_Sm_le. apply Hm. * apply lt_S_n. apply IHm. apply le_not_lt. intro C. apply H. clear -Hm C. apply lelt_trans with m. ++ apply gt_S_le. apply Hm. ++ apply lt_pred_lt_succ. apply C.
